title: BRIEF-Enwave Expands Agreement With Tilray Providing For Cannabis Drying In Portugal
text: February 27, 2018 / 2:04 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Enwave Expands Agreement With Tilray Providing For Cannabis Drying In Portugal Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Enwave Corp: * ENWAVE EXPANDS AGREEMENT WITH TILRAY PROVIDING FOR CANNABIS DRYING IN PORTUGAL * ENWAVE - ‍ TO EXERCISE OPTION. TILRAY MUST SUBMIT PURCHASE ORDER FOR LARGE-SCALE REVENUE MACHINERY IN H1 OF 2018, AND PAY DEPOSIT REQUIRED THEREUNDER​ * ENWAVE CORP - ‍ALL OTHER TERMS OF OPTION ARE CONFIDENTIAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
